artist: Manufacturer: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843-1950s
description: 2-storied bank building with open design on all sides; 6 arched windows and rectangular doors on front band back; 2 circles with cross inside near center on front and back
inscription:
Inscription

on front, near window below roof, in low relief: [PAT APLD FOR]
title: "Victorian House" still bank
